result.purpose: Responsible for configuring and initializing logging mechanisms using Sentry and Zap loggers.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating logger configurations in separate files for maintainability and clarity.

pkg/loggers/zap.go.purpose: This file configures and creates a Zap logger with custom encoding for logging levels.
